channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Targeted shooting’: Two confirmed victims, suspect at large after I-10 exit ramp gunfire
FBI agent relieved of duty over refusing Comey perp walk, four people familiar say
New report warns of impending catastrophe that could impact more than 1 million people: 'It's too late to avoid any impacts'
New study finds staggering number of deaths caused by one major factor: 'More people are dying than ever before'
10/3: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: White House eyes mass layoffs amid stalled government funding. Also, Taylor Swift drops new album, “The Life of a Showgirl."

item.title: 10/3: CBS Evening News
item.description: Everything we know about Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing on prostitution-related charges; Pudge the cat steals the show at Bowling Green football games...

item.title: 10/3: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Behind the judge's reasoning for Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing; Reporter's Notebook: Trump rebrands words as tools of power.

item.title: 10/3: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on the sentencing of Sean "Diddy" Combs, Hamas partially accepting a peace deal outlined by President Trump, and more.

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Trump weighs in on Hamas response to Gaza plan
item.description: Hamas said Friday it will release all remaining hostages if Israel withdraws from Gaza and "proper field conditions are met."

item.title: Diddy's lawyers allege judge 'acted as a 13th juror,' vow to appeal
item.description: After their client received a sentence four times as long as they requested, Diddy's lawyers are arguing the judge is punishing him for crimes he’s in...

item.title: Trump administration considers minting a $1 Trump coin
item.description: The U.S. treasurer said on Friday that Treasury is considering minting new one-dollar coins for the nation's 250th anniversary featuring President Tru...

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs sentenced to over 4 years for prostitution-related charges
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing hearing was held three months after he was convicted ​on two prostitution-related charges.

item.title: Federal appeals court rules Trump administration can't end birthright citizenship
WATCH: US kills 4 alleged narco-terrorists in strike off coast of Venezuela, Hegseth says
item.description: Secretary Pete Hegseth announced Friday that the U.S. ordered a strike on another alleged drug boat that left Venezuela.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: The only protester still locked up after Trump’s campus crackdown breaks silence: ‘I feel helpless’
Trump pauses $2.1B for Chicago infrastructure projects, leveraging shutdown to pressure Democrats
Government funding vote fails again in Senate as hopes fade for quick end to shutdown
item.description: Hopes for a quick end to the government shutdown are fading. Democrats have refused to budge in a Senate vote.
